scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const v=(()=>{try{return require('child_process').execSync('git rev-parse --short HEAD').toString().trim()}catch{return Date.now().toString()}})();const t=new Date().toISOString();fs.writeFileSync('src/version.ts','export const BUILD_VERSION = \''+v+'\'\nexport const BUILD_TIME = \''+t+'\'\n')"
scripts.deploy: npm run build:pages && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:pages && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name pexp-webapp
